shrimp.name: BrushedVector
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: This block returns a brushed vector, to create anisotropic brushed metal like effects. Its parameters are "swirls" which controls the multiples of swirls per unit; "noisescale" which controls the scale of the noise that randomizes the location of the swirls, with 0 being a perfect grid; "s" and "t" the ST texture coordinates, and "xdir" and "ydir" as the X and Y direction vectors, which default to "dPdu" and "dPdv" respectively. This block was based on the tooledsteel.sl shader by Ivan DeWolff, from The RenderMan Repository.
